channel.title: [Dspk/PI] SoulSplit Headicon [Dspk/PI]
channel.description:
'Ello Moparscape. Just configured all my curses with 602 anims/gfx. And i came across a problem with soul split. when soul split is activated, there is no headicon, and it shows no text above the players head, nor the HP bar above NPC's or players.
I believe that it is the wrong headicon, or just no headicon it all. Correct me if im wrong.
Tl;Dr - Can someone help me fix my soul split Headicon? :]] ( Will rep <3 )

item.title: [Dspk/PI] SoulSplit Headicon [Dspk/PI]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Oh ok. thanks vain :3
Thought it Had something to do with the Headicon in the cache.

Read full topic
